name: Game Development Is Hard
description:
I'm pretty young, but this is my first time participating in a game jam, and the game is very short. The Game Jam this was made for was the Black Thorn Prod Game Jam that lasted One Week. I didn't get any help from people for the coding (other than play testing) and I made it in Unity 2D. Hope you like it!

P.S. There is no Part 2 just do alt f4.
